message: This is the first product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. But, I want to make it clear that I'm willing to give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied. So, what do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm willing to take a chance on this first product. I appreciate your refund policy!

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance on the first product! Since you're already a customer, I'd like to offer you a special deal on this next one. I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20 if you buy this product. It's a great value, and I think you'll really like it. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm a bit hesitant after the last product. Maybe we can talk about it again later.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with great products. This next one is a bit different, though. I've received a new shipment, and I'm offering a 30-day money-back guarantee on this one. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I still need some time to decide. I'm not sure I'm ready to buy just yet. How about I take a look at a few more products before making a decision?

No problem at all, Bob. I completely understand. I'll give you some time to think about it. In the meantime, I'll give you a more detailed description of this product. It's a great value for the price, and I think you'll find it's a good fit for you. I'll also include some customer reviews from other satisfied customers who have purchased similar products. Let me send those over to you.
Thanks, Alice, I appreciate the information. I'll take a look at the details and reviews, but I'm still not ready to buy. I'm going to hold off for now and see how things go.

I think I've given you enough time to consider the previous products, Bob. This next one is a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased this product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one - if you buy it now, I'll throw in a free upgrade that's worth an additional $20. What do you say?
Alice, I'm finally ready to give it another shot.  The special deal sounds good, and I'm intrigued by your confidence in this product.  Let's do it!

I'm glad you're giving me another chance, Bob! I'm confident that this next product will exceed your expectations. I'll let you in on a little secret: this product is one of my personal favorites, and I've seen it make a huge impact on my other customers. I'm willing to offer you an even better deal than before - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. What do you say?
Alice, you're making a strong case! I'm starting to feel more confident with your recommendations.  Let's go for it, I'll take the product and look forward to that 10% discount on my next purchase!

I'm glad you're feeling more confident in my recommendations, Bob! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some issues with this particular item in the past, and I'm not as confident in its quality as I am with some of my other products. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that it's a risk. I'm not offering any additional discounts or guarantees on this one. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your honesty. While I value your recommendations, I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather wait for another product that you're more confident in.

I completely understand your decision, Bob. I appreciate your caution. This next product is one of my top recommendations, and I'm very confident in its quality. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 5-year warranty on this one, which is longer than usual. I think you'll be extremely happy with this product, and I'm willing to stand behind it. What do you say?
Alice, your confidence in this product, along with the extended warranty, makes me feel much better. I'm ready to give it a shot.
